verses.name: Nahum 3:1
verses.text: Woe to the bloody city! it is all full of lies and robbery; the prey departeth not;

verses.name: Nahum 3:2
verses.text: The noise of a whip, and the noise of the rattling of the wheels, and of the pransing horses, and of the jumping chariots.

verses.name: Nahum 3:3
verses.text: The horseman lifteth up both the bright sword and the glittering spear: and there is a multitude of slain, and a great number of carcases; and there is none end of their corpses; they stumble upon their corpses:
